summary: A mischievous high school sophomore faces a conflict of conscience vs. character when his best friend becomes linked to the death of a youth from another clique in suburban Middle America circa '76.
cast: Nathan Stevens|Cameron Richardson|Jorge Garcia|Jason Segel|James Ransone|Jason Dill|John William Simmons|Claire Titelman|Lenny Hirsh|Charlie Babcock|Athena Cansino|Rhia Bassett|Elise Robertson|Kelsey Grammer|Michael Emanuel|Don Brunner II|Gary Cairns|Pattie Tierce|George Russo|Rick Otto|Dennis Swanson|Mark Norris|George LePorte|Nathan Blank|Michael Farewell|Michele Fulton|Claire Kennedy|Katrina Mock|Amanda Kelly|Stacy Fuson|Court Young|Brian Vaughan|Cyd Strittmatter|John Patrick Amedori|Michael Horsely|Ele Keats|Caitlin Keats|Paul Mumford|Chris Premer|Rudy Courtade|Ryan Negri|Jensen Fairchild|Deborah Fairchild|Jerry Giordano|Norwood Cheek|Mike Johnson|Matthew Rimmer|Ray Artis|Scott Greenwald|Tom Lehr|Pete Munday|Georgie Del Junco|Anthony Amedori|Vanessa Angel|James 'Spud' Danicic|Troy DeWalt|Mike George|Whitney Hall|Veronica Laurence|Maryann Majick|Lisa Rapp|Allie Raye|Colton Shires|Barry Sigismondi|Lindsay Taylor
title: The Good Humor Man
